# Read in response data

```{r}

response_all <- read_csv(here('data/response_all.csv'))

```

# Model inputs

```{r}

model_inputs <- response_all %>%
  select(ID, event,
         MI10_mmhr, MI20_mmhr, MI30_mmhr,
         MI60_mmhr, year, stage_rise_cm,
         stage_area, lag2p_hr, duration_hr,
         response_manual, event_sum_mm, month,
         treatment, burn, area, cat, Area_km2,
         start_time,end_time)
  

```
